landing_about1: Applied Computer Science Student @ HTW Berlin
landing_about2: Presently Computer Science Master in Berlin
landing_about3: Future full stack dev // web designer
resume_entry_header1: Applied Computer Science / B. Sc. @ University of Applied Sciences Berlin, DE
resume_entry_description1: With a specialisation in data science I have an expertise in algorithms and frameworks of analyzing and visualize big data.
resume_entry_description2: As part of my Bachlor degree I did a 3 month full-time internship at the company Tastenexpress located in Berlin. I programmed OpenERP-software Odoo and improved my Python, XML and HTML / CSS skills. I took part of the software developement, planing, management and designing. I designed a new logo and official company documents too.
resume_entry_header3: Mentoring Job as a Java Programmer @ University of Applied Sciences Berlin, DE
resume_entry_description3: In the winter semester of 2021/2022 I was working as a mentor in the course 'Programming 2' by Thomas Schwotzer. Main course aspects were test-driven software development with Java. I implemented a Tic-Tac-Toe application in milestones with corresponding learning aspects and presented my code to the students in classroom. I helped the students with their own Java course projects which had to be a game contributed on two systems.
resume_entry_header4: Computer Science // Mathematics / B. Sc. @ University Bielefeld, DE
resume_entry_description4: Shortly after my highschool degree I started to studied Computer Science major and Mathematics minor at University Bielefeld. At the end of my first semester, I moved to Berlin and applied to the University of Applied Sciences Berlin.
resume_entry_header5: High School Degree @ Hannah-Arendt Highschool Lengerich, DE
resume_entry_description5: My highschool majors were Computer Science and Mathematics, as well as English and Pedagogy as sub-majors. Since grade 8 I had computer science courses and was interested in them early on. I voluntarily took part in a project group where we developed a AI application in a team in 10nth grade.
skills_design_description1: Web design in several own projects
project_card_description1: In my bachelor thesis I evaluate selected methods to measure accessibility on websites and improve selected tool features in a browser extension. Make the internet more accessible. For all.

project_card_description2: During some off-time I started to work on a new portfolio website, which you are currently on. I wanted to showcase myself in a professional way and display my experience. I designed everything myself while coding my website as a React Webapplication, deployed on GitHub.
